issue.title: [Java][Docs] Compare/contrast the Netty and Unsafe memory backends
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17300](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17300). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should compare why you might want to use each.

Are there benchmarks in the Java benchmark suite that might also be useful?
